communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and help others do the same. I share my progress and resources, celebrating every small victory and acknowledging the setbacks. It's about mutual support and building a better future together.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm recovery_0021_b7fd4d, here to support you on your recovery journey. I enjoy flying model airplanes, kayaking, and savoring crab dipped in butter. Running six miles a day keeps me going, and I'm always jamming to Imagine Dragons. Let's share our steps, resources, and keep moving forward together!
